doc:
Joan Wheeler https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joan_Wheeler 0 Joan Wheeler Ankrum (January 8, 1913 Palo Alto, California – December 20, 2001 Los Angeles, California) was an American film actress of the 1930s and founder of the Ankrum Gallery on La Cienega Boulevard in Los Angeles. She was the wife of actor Morris Ankrum. Joan_Wheeler_Ankrum ( January_8_,_1913_Palo_Alto , California – December_20_,_2001_Los_Angeles , California ) was an_American_film_actress of the_1930s_and_founder of the_Ankrum_Gallery on La_Cienega_Boulevard in Los_Angeles . She was the_wife of actor_Morris_Ankrum .
